briefdescription.para: Object Attribute Types.
Structure to store filter conditions.
Structure to manage the Object linked list.
Structure containing object metadata.
Structure containing object information.
Structure containing data used by OACP operations.
Structure containing data used by OLCP operations.
Structure containing data used the Object Server.
Structure containing all the data needed for the Object Server operation.
Initialize the Object Transfer Protocol Service (OTPS).
Retrieve the current ID for the OTPS service associated with a given channel.

parameterdescription.para: Channel ID for the current connection.
channel ID if valid, or 0 if not valid.
Channel ID for the current connection.

simplesect.para: The channel ID if valid, or 0 if not valid.

briefdescription.para: Set the CCCD indices used by the application for OTPS service characteristics.

parameterdescription.para: Object Action Control Point CCCD index.
Object List Control Point CCCD index.
Object Changed CCCD index.
Object Action Control Point CCCD index.
Object List Control Point CCCD index.
Object Changed CCCD index.

briefdescription.para: Get the CCCD index used by the application for OTPS service characteristics.

parameterdescription.para: Current cid.
Type of index requested.
Output index.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, 1 if there is an error.

parameterdescription.para: Current cid.
Type of index requested.
Output index.

simplesect.para: 0 if successful, 1 if there is an error.

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer to a specific attribute of the current object in the Object List.

detaileddescription.para:
cid
Connection ID for the current connection.
attrType
Type of attribute to retrieve (e.g., size, type, property, etc.).
pAttribute
Pointer to store the attribute data if found.
0 if the current object is valid and the attribute exists, or an error code if the current object is invalid or the attribute does not exist.
Get a pointer to a specific attribute of the current object in the Object List.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Type of attribute to set (e.g., size, type, property, etc.).
Pointer to the attribute data to set for the current object.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the attribute is set successfully. OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_INVALID_OBJECT when the current object in the OLCP is invalid.

briefdescription.para: Get a pointer to a specific attribute of the current object in the Object List.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Type of attribute to retrieve (e.g., size, type, property, etc.).
Pointer to store the attribute data if found.

simplesect.para: 0 if the current object is valid and the attribute exists, or an error code if the current object is invalid or the attribute does not exist.

briefdescription.para: Sets the name attribute for the currently selected object.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Pointer to the name data.
Length of the name data.

simplesect.para:
The result of the name setting operation. Possible return values include:
ATT_SUCCESS if the name is successfully set.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ if the write request is rejected.
ATT_OTP_ERR_OBJ_NOT_SELECTED if the object is not selected.
ATT_OTP_ERR_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS if the name already exists.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the name attribute for the currently selected object.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Pointer to the buffer to store the name data.
Pointer to the variable to store the length of the name data.

simplesect.para:
The result of the name retrieval operation. Possible return values include:
ATT_SUCCESS if the name is successfully retrieved.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ if the write request is rejected.
ATT_OTP_ERR_OBJ_NOT_SELECTED if the object is not selected.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t cid, uint8_t filterId, uint8_t *pValue, uint16_t len)
memberdef.name: OtpVFSSetFilter

briefdescription.para: Sets a filter condition for the specified filter ID in the Object Transfer Service.

detaileddescription.para: This function sets a filter condition for the specified filter ID in the Object Transfer Service. The filter condition is used to filter objects during an object listing operation.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Filter ID to set the condition for (1 to 3).
Pointer to the buffer containing the filter condition data.
Length of the filter condition data.

simplesect.para:
The result of the filter condition setting operation. Possible return values include:
ATT_SUCCESS if the filter condition is successfully set.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ if the write request is rejected.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the filter condition for the specified filter ID in the Object Transfer Service.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the filter condition for the specified filter ID in Object Transfer Service. The filter condition is used to filter objects during an object listing operation.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Filter ID to retrieve the condition for (1 to 3).
Pointer to the buffer to store the retrieved filter condition data.
Pointer to the variable to store the length of the retrieved filter condition data.

simplesect.para:
The result of the filter condition retrieval operation. Possible return values include:
ATT_SUCCESS if the filter condition is successfully retrieved.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ if the write request is rejected.

briefdescription.para: Create a request to create an object in the Object Transfer Protocol Service (OTPS).

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.
Pointer to the desired object size.
Pointer to the object type UUID.
true if the type is 128 bits long, false if 16 bits long.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the request is successful, or an error code if the operation failed.

briefdescription.para: Create a request to delete an object in the Object Transfer Protocol Service (OTPS).

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the request is successful, or an error code if the operation failed.

briefdescription.para: Deletes an object in the Object Server.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Object ID of the selected object.

simplesect.para:
The result of the attribute setting operation. Possible return values include:
ATT_SUCCESS if the attribute is successfully set.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ if the write request is rejected.
ATT_OTP_ERR_OBJ_NOT_SELECTED if the object is not selected.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ for other invalid write requests.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t cid, uint8_t objId[6], uint32_t length, uint32_t offset, uint8_t *pBuff)
memberdef.name: OtpVFSWriteDataUi

briefdescription.para: Write data to the selected object in the OTP VFS.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Object Id
Length of the data to be written.
Offset at which to start writing the data.
Pointer to the data to be written.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or an error code on failure.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint8_t cid, uint8_t objId[6], uint32_t length, uint32_t offset, uint8_t *pBuff)
memberdef.name: OtpVFSReadDataUi

briefdescription.para: Write data to the selected object in the OTP VFS.

detaileddescription.para:
cid
Connection ID for the current connection.
objId
Object Id
length
Length of the data to be read.
offset
Offset at which to start reading the data.
pBuff
Pointer to the read data.
0 on success, or an error code on failure.
Write data to the selected object in the OTP VFS.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Object Id
Length of the data to be read.
Offset at which to start reading the data.
Pointer to the read data.

simplesect.para: 0 on success, or an error code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Create a request to calculate the CRC checksum for a specified range of data within an object.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.
Object Id
Offset within the object's data where CRC calculation should start.
Length of the data range for CRC calculation.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the request is successful, or an error code if the operation failed.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.
Offset within the object's data where CRC calculation should start.
Length of the data range for CRC calculation.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the request is successful, or an error code if the operation failed.

briefdescription.para: Performs an Object List Control Point (OLCP) operation.

detaileddescription.para: This function performs an OLCP operation on objects based on the provided operation code.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Pointer to the buffer containing the OLCP operation data.
Pointer to the variable to store the OLCP operation response.

simplesect.para:
The result of the OLCP operation. Possible return values include:
ATT_SUCCESS if the OLCP operation is successfully executed.
ATT_OTP_ERR_WRITE_REQ_REJ if the write request is rejected.

briefdescription.para: Read data from the object based on the read request attributes.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.
Pointer to the buffer to store the read data.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the read operation is successful, or an error code if the operation failed.

briefdescription.para: Initiates a read operation request from the current object in the Object Access Control Point (OACP) over L2CAP.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
L2CAP Connection ID.
Pointer to a boolean indicating whether the read operation is finished.

simplesect.para:
OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the read operation request is successfully initiated, or an error code if the operation cannot be initiated. Possible error codes include:
OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_OPERATION_FAILED when the operation fails.
OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS when the operation is successful.

briefdescription.para: Handle the start of the OACP read operation.

parameterdescription.para: Connection identifier.

simplesect.para: 0 on successful operation.

briefdescription.para: Handle the start of the OACP write operation.

parameterdescription.para: Connection identifier.

simplesect.para: 0 on successful operation.

briefdescription.para: Get the checksum of the currently selected object in the OTP VFS list.

parameterdescription.para: Object Id
Connection ID.

simplesect.para: Checksum of the currently selected object.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.

simplesect.para: Checksum of the currently selected object.

briefdescription.para: Cleanup the OTP VFS list by removing objects with a name length of 0.

detaileddescription.para: This function removes objects with a name length of 0 from the filteredIdHead list and moves them to the freeIdHead list. It also updates the total number of objects.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.

briefdescription.para: Sort the objects in the OTP VFS list based on the specified sort type.

detaileddescription.para: This function sorts the objects in the filteredIdHead list of the given connection based on the specified sort type.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.
Sort type.

briefdescription.para: Clear the "mark" attribute for all objects in both filtered and used lists.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID.

briefdescription.para: Retrieves the total number of filtered objects for the current connection in the Object Transfer Protocol (OTP) Service.

detaileddescription.para: This function retrieves the total number of filtered objects for the current connection in the OTP Service.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.

simplesect.para: The total number of filtered objects for the current connection.

briefdescription.para: Set the features field for the OTPS service for a given connection.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Features field value to be set.

briefdescription.para: Set the MTU length for the L2Cap Communication for a given connection.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
MTU Length for the current connection.

briefdescription.para: Initialize a linked list node.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the node to be initialized.

briefdescription.para: Insert a node into the linked list after the head.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the head of the linked list.
Pointer to the node to be inserted.

briefdescription.para: Remove a node from the linked list.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the node to be removed.

briefdescription.para: Initiates a write operation request for the current object in the Object Access Control Point (OACP) over L2CAP.

parameterdescription.para: Connection ID for the current connection.
Length of the data to write.
Pointer to the data buffer to be written.
Pointer to a boolean indicating whether the write operation is finished.

simplesect.para: OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_SUCCESS if the write operation request is successfully initiated. OTP_VFS_OACP_ERR_OPERATION_FAILED when an operation is already in progress or if there is an invalid handle.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t hdl, uint32_t offset, uint8_t *buff, uint32_t len)
memberdef.name: OtpVFSCoreWrite

briefdescription.para: Write data to the OTP Filesystem.

parameterdescription.para: Handle for the entry.
Offset within the entry to start writing.
Pointer to the data to be written.
Length of the data to be written.

simplesect.para: The number of bytes successfully written.
